attributes.action: REFORM OUR LAWS TO ALLOW CONSTITUENCIES VOTERS TO REMOVE MP’S AT ANY TIME
attributes.additional_details: WE HAVE A CONSTITUTIONAL CRISIS CREATED BY OUR OWN POLITICIANS SELF INTEREST
attributes.background:
THE BEHAVIOUR OF ELECTED MP’S OVER THE LAST 2 YEARS, HAS HIGHLIGHTED TO EVERYONE, HOW UNREPRESENTATIVE THE PARLIMENTARY SYSTEM HAS BECOME.

THE ONLY WAY TO ENSURE THE VOTERS ARE REPRESENTED IS TO ALLOW VOTERS TO REMOVE MP’S AT ANY TIME.
